CustomField.description: Created as a part of story BIZ-47951 User for product related approval
CustomField.formula: IF((D_b__c = true)||(S_pfr__c = true)||(On_Prem__c = true)||( On_Prem_Multi_year_product__c= true)||(Has_Trial_Product__c = true)|| ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type__c, 'Contract Replacement')||(Cloud_Migration__c = true)|| (Repstor__c = true)|| (Legacy_Repstor_Agreement__c=true)|| (Repstor_Retro__c=true)|| (Partner_Related__c=true), true, false)
CustomField.label: Product Related Approval
